We are recruiting for a Senior Data Analyst, US Citizen who holds and DoD Active/Current Secret SSBI or Top Secret Clearance

JOB DESCRIPTION
  • The successful candidate will participate in a team environment supporting a U.S. Government contract that provides personnel security management to DoD.
  • The position involves extensive work in a Linux environment and development of SQL queries for use with Ad Hoc Reporting and/or analysis and correction of data in an Oracle database.
  • The candidate will need strong analytical skills, strong communication skills, and extensive experience working with Oracle database
Qualifications

KEYRESPONSIBILITIES
  • Involved in the developmentof complex SQL queries and scripts for use in Ad Hoc Reports, analysis of dataquality, and data manipulation within an Oracle database. Strong dataanalytical skills and experience with the ability to communicate is necessary.
  • Solid workingknowledge of Linux commands and development and execution of shell scripts, databasestored procedures, SQL, PL/SQL and work with relational databases.
  • Must be able towork in a team environment and independently with minimum management oversight.Must be extremely attentive to detail as the successful candidate will bereporting on and modifying production data for the customer.
  • Must possess highenergy and strong motivation to make a difference.
  • Fast paced environmentwith changing priorities. Switching tasks without loss of productivity is amust
QUALIFICATIONS/REQUIREDEXPERIENCE
  • Strongfamiliarity with Linux, Shell scripting, and Perl
  • Data analysis experience 3 to 5 years is preferred
  • Oracle SQL andPL/SQL experience - 3 to 5 years is preferred
  • Oracle EntityRelationship Diagrams (ERD) experience - 3 to 5 years preferred
  • Minimum of 3 years' experience using Oracle SQL Developer and Oracle SQL*Plus.
  • Experience with MS SQL Server and MS SQL Server Management Studio.
  • Common MS Office softwareskills (Word, Excel, OneNote, PowerPoint) and MS SharePoint navigation anddocument versioning
  • Experience withlegacy data and document migration processes
  • Understanding ofapplication development lifecycle processes is a plus
